channel.title: Allstarscape help?
channel.description: I have dloaded allstar scape source and i need help to try to get me owner on it...can you please help me because allstar scape was one of the first server i ever played on and i would like the help! thank you

item.title: Allstarscape help?
item.dc:creator: @youwillknow youwillknow
item.description:
@youwillknow wrote:

[quote=“latvians, post:3, topic:336856”]open game folder there will be a folder named “CHARACTERS” OPEN IT find your nickname
character-rights = 0 \ 1\ 2\3
player \ mod\admin\owner[/quote]

I think allstarscape got a right 4 too , i’m not sure but you can try :
[center]character-right 4 is for the Coder …[/center]

Read full topic

item.title: Allstarscape help?
item.dc:creator: @latvians latvians
item.description:
@latvians wrote:

open game folder there will be a folder named “CHARACTERS” OPEN IT find your nickname
character-rights = 0 \ 1\ 2\3
player \ mod\admin\owner

Read full topic

item.title: Allstarscape help?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

open the characters folder, open your file, find the character-rights = 0 line and change the 0 to a 3.

Read full topic
